Reviews.Title: works good- but takes time and patience record and network it.
Reviews.Author: W. D. Williamson

ProductInfo.Features:
Video inputs: 16 Channels with RJ12 and 8 BNC
Advanced Scheduling; Pre-Event and Post-Event recording (up to 2min ea.).
5 search modes
1TB hard drive included (expandable up to 2TB)
Connection: 10/100 ethernet
ProductInfo.Name: 16 Channel Video Security System with DVR and 24IR Cameras
